mapper.select: select b.bookTitle, b.author, r.bookNo, r.rentDate, r.returnDate, bs.bookCode from renthistory as r inner join bookstatus as bs on r.bookNo=bs.bookNo inner join book as b on b.bookcode=bs.bookCode where r.id=#{id} and not r.rentDate is null

select b.bookTitle, b.author, r.bookNo, r.rentDate, bs.returnDueDate, bs.rentStatus, bs.reserveStatus, DATEDIFF(curdate(), bs.returnDueDate) as datedif from renthistory as r inner join bookstatus as bs on r.bookNo=bs.bookNo inner join book as b on b.bookcode=bs.bookCode where not bs.rentstatus=2 and r.id=#{id} and r.returndate is null;
mapper.update: update renthistory as r inner join bookstatus as bs on r.bookno=bs.bookno inner join reserve as rs on rs.bookno=bs.bookno set r.returndate=curdate(),rs.reservefindate=date_add(returnduedate, interval 3 day), bs.rentstatus=2 where r.bookno=#{bookno}
mapper.insert: insert into renthistory (bookNo, rentDate, id) value (#{bookNo}, curdate(), #{id});
mapper.update: update bookstatus set rentStatus=0, returnDueDate=date_add(curdate(),interval+7 day), reserveStatus=0 where bookNo=#{bookNo};
